tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE underwriting_guidelines (
    guideline_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    guideline_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    guideline_description TEXT,
    min_age INT,
    max_age INT,
    min_income DECIMAL(10, 2),
    credit_score_range VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE criteria (
  criteria_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  criteria_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  criterion_type VARCHAR(50),
  guideline_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (guideline_id) REFERENCES underwriting_guidelines(guideline_id)
);

CREATE TABLE underwriting_guidelines (
  guideline_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  guideline_name VARCHAR(255),
  guideline_description TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE criteria_categories (
  category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR(255),
  category_description TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE criteria_details (
  detail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  criteria_name VARCHAR(255),
  criteria_description TEXT,
  category_id INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE underwriting_guidelines (
    guideline_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    guideline_name VARCHAR(255),
    guideline_details TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE criteria_categories (
    category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(255),
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE criteria_details (
    detail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_id INT,
    detail_name VARCHAR(255),
    detail_value TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE company_underwriters (
    underwriter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    underwriter_name VARCHAR(255),
    underwriter_email VARCHAR(255),
    underwriter_phone VARCHAR(20),
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE underwriting_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    guideline_id INT,
    underwriter_id INT,
    report_details TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
)
